nodes.text: The Sadow'een were a secret order of assassins who served the Sith Lord Naga Sadow.

During the reign of the Sith Empire, they were responsible for dispatching their master's enemies. At some point, they established a temple in the Glacial Fissure area of Hoth. The Sadow'een were responsible for killing Sadow's rival Horak-mul at the start of the Great Hyperspace War, though his spirit managed to survive. The assassins were entombed in the temple after their work was finished.

By the time of the Cold War, the Sadow'een Temple was reduced to ruins, with only the catacombs surviving largely intact, though Naga Sadow's ancient battle droids continued their patrols. Members of the Sith Imperial Reclamation Service did not seriously consider Hoth as a location for the temple until the arrival on the ice planet of Darth Zash's apprentice, Kallig. The Sith Inquisitor, together with Lieutenant Talos Drellik of the Reclamation Service, visited the temple in search of Horak-mul's sarcophagus. The long dead Sith Lord contacted them and offered his power to the Inquisitor on the condition that the latter defile the tomb of the Sadow'een, avenging the Sith Lord's death.
